properties.name: Alan Ginsberg's House
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv1010 MONTGOMERY STREET, San Francisco, 94102This was where Alan Ginsberg\'s HOWL was written. It\'s located on Montgomery Street between Vallejo and Broadway.

properties.name: Crashing the Bashors
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv CrittendenIV\'s wonderful Aunt and Uncle welcome the road weary Fellaheens.

properties.name: Jack Kerouac's House
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv29 russell st san franciscoThe house where Jack wrote On The Road. TO GET TO 29 RUSSELL STREET: Go up Union Street to Hyde Street..turn left and go to the first right turn only street...thats Russell Street, turn right and half way down the block on your left will stand 29 Russell Street complete with large brass numerals to mark the location.

properties.name: Oregon Covered Bridge Festival
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv The Oregon Covered Bridge Festival gives residents and visitors alike a chance to enjoy our beautiful bridges and learn about their heritage. Oregon is proud to be the host to 51 covered bridges, the most this side of the Mississippi River. This festival is the only one of its kind held on the West Coast. And, as always, the FRN will be there, a little tipsy, recording and observing.

properties.name: Pete's Place
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv 302 State St # 200, Salem, ORThe most refreshing pint of PBR ever, and only .50. CrittendenIV has been known to frequent this wonderful bar.

properties.name: SC10 Customer Appreciation Picnic
properties.description: Posted by CrittendenivThis where they hold the annual customer appreciation picnic. They hand out hamburgers, hot dogs, chips and sodas. You get a chance to spin a wheel and get a prize. It\'s fun. It\'s also the least they can do for their customers who spend more than a 20 a month on DSL services.

properties.name: Somewhere Out In The Sea Fishing For Salmon
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv  I have no idea if this is the exact location, but it\'s roughly where I caught my two fish. They were big and I have already enjoyed their delicious pink meat. Captain Mark was a madman and his 17 year old son already had his first DUI.

properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv The studio for CrittendenIV

properties.name: The Fellaheens depart
properties.description: Posted by CrittendenivEarly morning departure to California

properties.name: The Warfield
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv982 Market St, San Francisco CA 94102Where CrittendenIV and Hamcock witnessed the glory that is Zappa Plays Zappa.

properties.name: Venti's
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv 233 Liberty St Ne, Salem, ORThe coolest place to eat, drink and take in edgy atmosphere.

properties.name: Vesuvio's Bar
properties.description: Posted by Crittendeniv 255 COLUMBUS AVE, San Francisco, CA 94123THE JACK KEROUAC: Its a combination of rum, tequila, orange/cranberry juice and lime. Served up in a large bucket glass!
